amendment.description: To require the State plan to describe how the State will coordinate the services supported to carry out the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 with State agencies and programs serving children in foster care and the foster families of such children.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2814 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2814 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2814 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2814 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Landrieu.
